title: New Holland Agriculture Publicly Launches the Industry's First All-Electric Utility Tractor with Autonomous Features ... - PR Newswire
summary: New Holland introduces the T4 Electric Power, the first all-electric utility tractor with autonomous features, aiming to revolutionize modern agriculture. The tractor offers powerful, emission-free and silent energy power, promising a sustainable and efficient future for farming operations.
green_innovation: TRUE - The new T4 Electric Power tractor from New Holland represents a green innovation as it introduces an all-electric utility tractor with autonomous features, aiming to support more sustainable agriculture and reduce environmental impacts.
business_innovation: TRUE - The introduction of the T4 Electric Power tractor by New Holland can be considered a business innovation as it represents a new and improved product offering in the market, differing significantly from previous products.
green_product: TRUE - The T4 Electric Power tractor is considered a green product as it is designed to significantly reduce environmental impact throughout its life cycle by providing emission-free and silent energy power while promoting sustainable agriculture practices.
green_process: TRUE - The T4 Electric Power tractor represents a green process as it utilizes electrified drivetrain technology, advanced battery systems, and autonomous features to minimize environmental impacts, reduce energy consumption, and promote sustainability in farming operations.
likely_naics_codes: Likely NAICS Codes: 333111 - Farm Machinery and Equipment Manufacturing, 333132 - Oil and Gas Field Machinery and Equipment Manufacturing, 333999 - All Other General Purpose Machinery Manufacturing, 336111 - Automobile Manufacturing
greenwashing: FALSE - The article does not exhibit greenwashing as it provides factual information about the green features and benefits of the T4 Electric Power tractor.
